text.author: Fatos Nano
text.sourcePublication: Alexander Baturo, Niheer Dasandi, and Slava Mikhaylov, "Understanding State Preferences With Text As Data: Introducing the UN General Debate Corpus" Research & Politics, 2017
text.title: Address by H. E. Mr. Fatos Nano Prime Minister of the Republic of Albania to the General Debate of the 59th Session of the United Nations General Assembly
text.summary: In a speech at the UN, Albania presents its work towards integration in NATO and adoption of European Union standards and collaborations ahead of general parliamentary elections the following year.
